name: Agent Character File
summary: Learn about .ACS files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: NOTE: Support for Microsoft Agent was discontinued with the release of Windows 7.

description: Animated character created with Microsoft Agent; can interact with the user using text-to-speech and speech recognition technologies; may be implemented in both applications and Web pages.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .acs file in Microsoft Visual Studio Code
images.caption: ACS file open in Microsoft Visual Studio Code
